pages.text: The first primary water container is the glass bottle.  It can be crafted from 3 pieces of glass, and glass can be formed by processing sand in a furnace.

The second primary water container is the terracotta bowl.  It can be made by crafting 3 clay balls, sourced from clay commonly found around the world at the bottom of rivers, into a clay bowl, which can then be processed in a furnace.
